content: My name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: We did not reach a final agreed price. The negotiation ended with an offer from me of 650 Euros per month, which was my maximum budget as a student, but Peter Schmidt from Germany believed the apartment warranted a higher rent.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as a 5 on a scale from 1 to 10. I am neither very satisfied nor very dissatisfied, as the negotiation process was amicable, but the lack of a final agreement leaves room for improvement.
name: Peter Schmidt
